en: Play cutscenes at the beginning of a stage and before a boss.
Show a timer in the bottom right that counts how long you've been playing a stage.
Play random round call announcements from Street Fighter Alpha 3 instead of the boss warning sirens.
Control the volume of the boss intro voice and announcement.
Infinite lives and bullets, rapidfire buster. Recommended for game journalists.
Limited to 3 shots at a time. Recommended for the average player.
Health is capped at half, 3 shots, enemies do 2x damage.
